meanings.sent1: The hacker harasses the company's website with multiple cyber-attacks.
meanings.sent2: The aggressive dog harasses the mailman every time he approaches the house.
meanings.sent3: The misbehaving child harasses the teacher by constantly asking unrelated questions.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds harass the town with continuous lightning strikes.
meanings.sent5: The relentless waves harass the shore, eroding it slowly over time.
